meanings.sent1: The tabletting of the medicine was done carefully by the pharmacist.
meanings.sent2: I watched the tabletting process at the factory with fascination.
meanings.sent3: The tabletting of the clay into shapes looked like a fun art project.
meanings.sent4: Her tabletting of ideas into a presentation was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The tabletting of the ingredients made the final product easy to consume.

meanings.definition: The process of compressing a powdered substance into a tablet form.
meanings.sent1: The tabletting of the powder required precise measurements.
meanings.sent2: The tabletting machine efficiently produced the tablets.
meanings.sent3: His tabletting of the sugar into candy was a sweet success.
meanings.sent4: The tabletting of thoughts into a concise statement was challenging.
meanings.sent5: The tabletting of the mixture resulted in perfectly shaped tablets.
